price: 62. Ma (arrin)kani (Jannada) baa marti- qaad wanaagsan mise geedka Zaquum.
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
